description: A sleek mobile app icon depicting a wallet with a stylized insurance symbol embedded within it. The background should be a clean white with subtle gradients to create depth. The app icon should convey a sense of security, accessibility, and convenience.

A dramatic, high-contrast image depicting a closed door with a sign that reads 'Access Denied'. The door is made of dark metal, and the sign is rusted and worn, suggesting a sense of abandonment and unwelcomeness. The background is a bleak and desolate landscape, hinting at the consequences of being denied access.

A close-up shot of a weathered, worn-out pair of work boots, sitting on a dusty concrete floor. The boots are covered in dirt, oil stains, and dried mud. A single wrench rests on top of the boots, leaning against the worn leather.
